content: designed by jerry burch piece of cake is a simple yarn cake cozy designed for birch tree fiber arts co s 2023 christmas in july event this simple cozy is worked in the round using only 20g s of sock yarn this is a fun and versatile project perfect for mini skeins or using up scraps it s a piece of cake ©birch tree fiber arts co 2023 page 1 materials 20g 80 yards fingering weight recommended birch tree fiber arts co rock n roll sock minis us 2 2 75 mm 9 circular needles us 2 2 75 mm dpn s double pointed needles stitch markers tapestry needle abbreviations bor = beginning of round bobble bind off co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together p purl pm place marker * repeat between * st s stitch es notes piece of cake is knit in the round from the cuff down with decreases to close the bottom the pattern includes instructions for a cozy that will fit a 50g & 100g cake of yarn gauge 32 stitches & 36 rounds = 3 5 inches on size us 2 needles although gauge is not critical for this pattern it may affect how much yarn is needed to complete the project ©birch tree fiber arts co 2023 page 2 directions using circular needles or dpn s co 56 72 stitches using a long tail cast on place marker and join to knit in the round ribbing * k2 p2 repeat from * to end of round repeat until piece measures 1 approximately 7 9 rounds body continue knitting every round until piece measures 3 5 4 5 approximately 28 36 rounds decreases round 1 *k6 k2tog repeat from * for larger size round 2 knit round 3 *k5 k2tog repeat from * round 4 knit switch to dpn s if needed magic loop is also a great alternative round 5 *k4 k2tog repeat from * round 6 knit round 7 *k3 k2tog repeat from * round 8 knit round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * round 10 knit round 11 *k1 k2tog repeat from * round 12 k2tog cut yarn leaving a 9 tail using a tapestry needle draw the yarn through the remaining sts and cinch to close weave in ends to secure finishing weave in remaining ends with a tapestry needle wash block and enjoy ©birch tree fiber arts co 2023 page 3
